textgoal: Define a function to add 2 to a number.
Define a function to use a function 3 times in a row.
Use twice to define a function that computes x plus 2

globals: {"twice":"function twice(f) { return (x) => f(f(x)); }","repeat":"function repeat(n, f) { return (x) => n == 0 ? x : repeat(n - 1, f)(f(x)); }"}
textgoal: The repeat function lets you use the same function many times!
